summary: Request to add a Temporal CLI-based ephemeral server for testing purposes in the Ruby SDK, similar to what other SDKs provide as a programmatic testing interface. The issue became obsolete after SDK rewrite made the previous implementation no longer applicable.
userImpact: Developers would have convenient programmatic access to an ephemeral Temporal server for local testing without manual setup.
proposedFix: Implement a programmatic interface similar to TestWorkflowEnvironment in TypeScript SDK that downloads and manages an ephemeral server.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent rewrite/refresh and this feature request applied to the previous version, making it no longer applicable to the current codebase.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
